name: Coats India (A Division of Madura Coats) Reviews

review.title: “A company having 180+ yrs of experience in being No. 1”
review.pros: Pros – Great co. to work with, people enjoy the benefit of working with premium brand, highly qualified and experienced bosses, Exceptional professional and personal life balance.
review.cons: Cons – Low salaries and high attrition rate at junior levels due to low monetary gains.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please look into your employee retention strategies, don't let juniors ask about the promotions, be aggressive and offer it yourself rather then offering when the employee is resigning.

review.title: “I was happy to work with Coats India”
review.pros: Pros – Coats used to recognise people coming up the ranks
review.cons: Cons – Seniors are not given due respect and Salary increases of late
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Look at the people's quality and pay them for their efficiency attached with Loyalty
